name: Ringside Bar
description: The Ringside Bar at the Eldorado offers a casual, lively atmosphere in the heart of the casino floor. Known for its friendly bartenders and generous pours, Ringside is a popular gathering spot for guests looking to enjoy a drink while soaking in the casino energy. It's a no-frills, good-times bar that's always buzzing.
shortDescription: Casual casino floor bar with friendly service and lively atmosphere at the Eldorado.

faqs.question: Is Ringside Bar open 24 hours?
faqs.answer: Yes, like many casino bars, Ringside offers service around the clock.

faqs.question: Where in the Eldorado is it?
faqs.answer: On the main casino floor, centrally located and easy to find.

faqs.question: What's the atmosphere like?
faqs.answer: Casual and lively with friendly bartenders and the energy of the casino surrounding you.

meta.title: Ringside Bar at Eldorado – 24hr Casino Bar Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Enjoy 24-hour drinks and casino energy at the Ringside Bar in Eldorado Resort. Casual and lively in downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Ringside Bar are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Travis J.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Ringside Bar. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Bill D.
testimonials.meta: Yelp · date night during golf trip
